ValidationRule.description: To create a SF Account Creation case with Product Type HIRE, the billing Information and Company Location are mandatory. RO-1759, RO-1760
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Account_Creation", ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, "HIRE"), OR( ISBLANK( Company_Location__c ) , ISBLANK( Bill_To_Name__c ) , ISBLANK( Billing_Street__c ) , ISBLANK( Billing_Zip_Postal_Code__c ) , ISBLANK( Billing_City__c ) , ISBLANK( billing_Country__c ) , ISBLANK(Billing_Email__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When creating a HIRE case, make sure to fill in the billing information and Company Location.
